lender.name: Erik

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: money is like manure - it works best if you spread it around

lender.name: Wanda
lender.loan_because: Helping others brings me great joy. When we give we receive, this to me it is what life is all about. Giving hope to those in need from our great abundance, by helping them to be self sufficient is probably one of the greatest gift we could give.

lender.name: Rich and Tiffany
lender.loan_because: we want to fill the "hole in our gospel" by helping others.

lender.name: Judi
lender.loan_because: I can and I should

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I hope it will help.

lender.name: Scotty
lender.loan_because: We live in a 'Lucky Country' and wish to share with others

lender.name: Ken and Peggy
lender.loan_because: We care. What Kiva is doing is creative and life-changing. We are excited to be a part.

lender.name: Alanna
lender.loan_because: I want to see positive change in the world. I want to see women empowered and sharing their gifts to the rest of humanity. We all need to work together to bring more light in these times.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer. I photograph people to capture their beauty and strength.

lender.name: Talia and Daryan
lender.loan_because: they need the support.

lender.name: Miho
lender.loan_because: I am privileged to pursue my dreams and I want to help others to overcome social and economic challenges in order to reach their dreams.
lender.occupational_info:
I teach students in the outdoors. I help them make a connection to their environment by exploring nature and take responsible actions to sustain our planet.
I also manage a project called If She Can Do It, You Can Too - Empowering Women Through Outdoor Role Models. It shares photographs and stories of diverse women from around the world demystifying the role of women in the outdoors. This project is dedicated to promoting womenâ€™s involvement in education, science, environmental conservation and adventures in nature. It is my hope that by sharing their stories that all people will be inspired to overcome any challenges in order to reach their dreams.

lender.name: Noxon
lender.loan_because: Even though we don't have much, many other people have much less.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: It makes sense!
lender.occupational_info: I provide emotional and physical care for people in various stages of HIV disease, mental illness and substance use.

lender.name: HoQECS & friends
lender.loan_because: ...we in our team of HoQECS are all entrepreneurs and know about the pressure and business. We would like to give incentives to grow ideas and daily business!
lender.occupational_info: We consult SME companies in several areas on their way to go international and explore new markets. You can read more at our Facebook page (search HoQECS).

lender.name: Sherrie
lender.loan_because: We in the United States take so much for granted that people in other parts of the world are in want of. This is me doing my own small part.

lender.loan_because: I can

lender.occupational_info: I'm an american kid.

lender.name: amy
lender.loan_because: it's a good thing to do!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have traveled the world and have seen poverty first hand. I tried to learn the local languages and in the process I've made many wonderful friends and learned (in their own words) how much a few hundred dollar loan can do. It can be the difference between sending their children to school or putting their child to work in the rice fields and I believe in giving everyone a chance to make it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a software engineer, entrepreneur, world traveler, and hobbyist photographer. I love traveling to villages, meeting locals, learning the local languages, making new friends, and taking their photos. Perhaps one day I'll turn that into a career.

lender.loan_because: I am way luckier than most peoole.

lender.name: Rachel

lender.occupation: Logistics Manager for the United States Air Force

lender.loan_because: I want to help others in need. Also to get others interested in Kiva so more people will have opportunities to start a business and feed their family.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in fifth grade and enjoy math and social studies. When I have free time I love playing soccer and dream of playing pro when i get older.

lender.occupational_info: I work with my family and help people buy and sell houses in Vancouver, B.C Canada.

lender.name: Rich
lender.occupational_info: RecycleinME is the best place to get business leads for scrap trade. This marketplace for scrap metal, non metal scrap, plastic scrap, rubber scrap and paper scrap was launched in 2002. Along with being a great platform for scrap trade, RecycleinME is also a great information portal to find scrap prices, scrap material trade procedures etc. RecycleinME also has a great community dedicated to scrap trade.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: 1) I can. 2) It's an innovative way to make capitalism work for the poor. 3) I can.

lender.name: Kavita
lender.loan_because: Kiva has revolutionized the global connectivity of lending and building self-efficacy of entrepreneurs worldwide. More importantly, the loans move beyond merely providing business capital, and instead help enrich the quality of life for loan recipients, who are better able to afford health care, education and housing. This framework has inspired me to become involved and watch businesses succeed and lives change for the better.

lender.name: Ospel Actueel
lender.loan_because: We as webmasters of a local newswebsite believe in this kind of projects.
lender.occupational_info: Webmasters newswebsite

lender.name: Lucinda
lender.loan_because: Generosity and caring about my fellow humans are simply the right things to do.
lender.occupational_info: I make people's writing grammatically correct and easier to read. A lot of my work is with writers whose native language is not English. As part of a team on an editing Web site, I see writing from around the world--everything from college entrance essays to business letters, reports, and student essays.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Around the world we all need each other for support to thrive. I find much satisfaction in being a part of this very positive social movement, and especially in seeing how all of our small collective efforts add up.
lender.occupational_info: I am a trauma therapist working with international immigrants to Southern Maine who have experienced torture by the hand of their own governments.

lender.name: Trudie
lender.loan_because: I like to help people achieve their goals, I used to think I didnt have much to offer , but Kiva makes it easy to share.

lender.name: Niels Peter
lender.loan_because: - I totally believe we need to support each other BUT I would prefer to support projects which are working towards making an effort in terms of sustainability.
lender.occupational_info: - I work with developing and designing projects and products that are truly sustainable. I have worked in India, Peru and Haiti but also Japan, the US and Europe - and I would like to help anyone really wants to make projects that really make a difference. This could be composting toilets, micro housing (Im btw starting a projects called Micro Living, which about developing totally self sustaining micro houses here in this part of the world (Europe) but at the same time helping doing the same for people who might not be able to make a self sustaining houses without both economic as well as technical help. You will be able to read more about the Micro Living project on www.npflint.com in the beginning of January 2010) - are you rich you pay are you poor maybe you help someone else...

lender.name: William
lender.occupational_info: Setup unique profiles and promote them continuously through submitinme.com. We offer turnkey solutions for your social media presence. Our job doesnâ€™t end with just creating the social media profiles, we promote them continuously with our blog promotion package.

lender.name: Kimmo
lender.loan_because: As a European I feel obliged to move some money to the less fortunate parts of the world.

lender.name: Robbie
lender.loan_because: I want to give other entrepreneurs who have a desire to live a better life who are in less fortunate circumstances a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Australian Visa Group was established with the aid of financial assistance. It feels right to pass on a helping hand to those who are embarking on a similar journey.
lender.occupational_info: We assist people to obain an Australian visa. Mainly through the skilled, employer sponsored, student, spouse and family visa streams.

lender.name: Raj
lender.loan_because: you need money to make money!
lender.occupational_info: As an entrepreneur I create, build and run companies in multiple sectors (started off in the technology arena). I also consult to governmental and private organisations, and tinker with many other things (if and when I find time) including breeding dogs and appreciating the fine art of beer!

lender.name: Kaitlyn
lender.loan_because: I have always had the privilege to have things that I need given to me by my parents and I have more than I could ever ask for and so thankful for everything they do for me. Loaning is a way for me to give back to people who just need a little help getting started :)
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, so there for I attend high school were hopefully Ill graduate in a year and then be able to move on to college and continue studying to become a teacher.

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: It is great to help provide opportunities for people who are motivated to work hard and make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a nurse working in mental health programs for 30 years and now work as a health care manager, overseeing hospital and community mental health services.

lender.name: Dana

lender.occupational_info: I have a business marketing metalworking products to retail customer in the USA, I also am building my own brand in this same channel.
